biotools.summary: The electrodiffusive Pinsky-Rinzel (edPR) model is multicompartmental neuron model that accounts for electrodiffusive ion concentration dynamics in a way that ensures a biophysically consistent relationship between ion concentrations, electrical charge, and electrical potentials in both the intra- and extracellular space.

bioschemas.name: edPR
bioschemas.summary: The electrodiffusive Pinsky-Rinzel (edPR) model is multicompartmental neuron model that accounts for electrodiffusive ion concentration dynamics in a way that ensures a biophysically consistent relationship between ion concentrations, electrical charge, and electrical potentials in both the intra- and extracellular space.
